page.title: 02EDUCATION
page.content: In Skelton and District many of the children under 5 years of age go to Playschool. This is a well organised group that meets in the village hall. After Playschool the children go on to Primary School. They start when they are 4 years old and leave at age 11. After they have finished at Primary School they go on to Secondary School in Penrith, 7 miles from Skelton; they travel on a School Bus. At the age of 13 they may transfer to Grammar School or remain at Comprehensive School. At 18 years of age they have a chance of going to College or University, this would entail travelling out of the area. They may leave the Education system to start work at 16 years of age.
